description: Create interactive forms and automate workflows with Fillout

actions.name: findFormByTitle
actions.description: Finds an existing forms by title.

actions.name: getFormResponses
actions.description: Fetch all responses for a Fillout form, with optional filters.

actions.name: getSingleResponse
actions.description: Retrieves a specific submission from a form.

triggers.name: new-form-response
triggers.description: Triggers when a new submission is received for a selected Fillout form.
